item.title: Judges reject Trump's pick for top New Jersey federal prosecutor, DOJ removes successor
item.description: The U.S. Justice Department accused a panel of New Jersey federal court judges of political motives for declining to permanently appoint President Don...

item.title: White House releases U.S.-Indonesia trade deal framework, final talks underway
item.description: The newly announced 19% tariff on Indonesian goods is lower than the 32% rate it had faced under President Donald Trump's previous "liberation day" pl...

item.title: New Jersey man pleads guilty to leading $600 million catalytic converter theft ring
item.description: The Covid pandemic saw an explosion in thefts of catalytic converters, which contain precious metals, including platinum, palladium and rhodium.

item.title: Sen. Mike Lee posts, deletes fake Fed Chair Powell resignation letter: Reports
item.description: The letter surfaced as President Donald Trump has bludgeoned the Federal Reserve chairman with criticism over his refusal to cut interest rates.

item.title: Trump China tariff deadline likely to be extended, Bessent says
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he will meet next week with Chinese trade negotiators in Stockholm for discussions on avoiding steep tariffs.
